attributes.action: To let ice cream vans play there melodys after 7pm
attributes.background: East Ayrshire council is putting a ban on the ice cream vans playing melodys after 7pm and is stopping the public knowing there in the area. Also upsetting as it's a long tradition getting out to sleep.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about something the UK Government or Parliament is responsible for. This was a decision of East Ayrshire Council.

You can contact your local councillor, who represents you. You can find who your local councillor is here:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
